## SCREEN\_READER\_TEXT\_PATH variable

HTTP path used on the assistive-webdriver server to get the text from the screen reader.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
SCREEN_READER_TEXT_PATH = "/session/:sessionId/screenReaderText"
```
